title._content: [Unidentified young soldier Confederate uniform with kepi] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified young soldier Confederate uniform with kepi] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype ; 9.4 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-576. Additional information in collections file. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Published in: Serrano, D. A. Still more Confederate faces. Bayside, NY: Metropolitan Company, 1992, p. 44. Published in: David, William C. First blood: Fort Sumter to Bull Run. Alexandria, Va.: Time-Life Books, 1983, p. 106. Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Youth--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
